net.mobid.codetraq.persistence
Class MessageDTO

java.lang.Object
  net.mobid.codetraq.persistence.MessageDTO

public class MessageDTO
extends java.lang.Object

This is the Message Object that can be saved into db4o. Unsent Message(s) go into the database and the main process will query into the database every so often to try to send them.
